item.title: Rogues and Alchemists Rejoice!
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Blizzard claims to be listening to your concerns and promises many fixes and changes. Alchemists are also promised the removal of the tedium from creating elixirs and flasks. Here’s an idea, how about not tune half the bosses in the … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Blizzard claims to be listening to your concerns and promises many fixes and changes. Alchemists are also promised the removal of the tedium from creating elixirs and flasks. Here’s an idea, how about not tune half the bosses in the damn game to require them.

item.title: Jesus Works For Blizzard?
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: An unhappy player on a PvP realm is begging Jesus to add guards outside of Karazhan to end the….PvP. Unfortunately, Jesus works on the quest design team and is unable to help. I’d recommend he email Satan, however, my inbox … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
An unhappy player on a PvP realm is begging Jesus to add guards outside of Karazhan to end the….PvP. Unfortunately, Jesus works on the quest design team and is unable to help.

I’d recommend he email Satan, however, my inbox is currently full.

item.title: Wtb Tinfoil Cap
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Entertaining rant from a paranoid space cow . Damn those buzzards!
item.content:encoded: Entertaining rant from a paranoid space cow . Damn those buzzards!

item.title: Fun with Pick Up Groups!
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Top ten list of signs your pug is destined for greatness . Personally, number four and eight are the most prevalent in my experience. Sadly, that is also in guild only groups.
item.content:encoded: Top ten list of signs your pug is destined for greatness . Personally, number four and eight are the most prevalent in my experience. Sadly, that is also in guild only groups.

item.title: All Armor Sets Available For Viewing
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Blizzard has updated their web site to include all of the sets for every valid race/class combo. Am I the only one to wonder what the hell they were smoking while designing a lot of the tier 4 and 5 … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Blizzard has updated their web site to include all of the sets for every valid race/class combo. Am I the only one to wonder what the hell they were smoking while designing a lot of the tier 4 and 5 sets?

item.title: More Hotfixes!
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: There were only a few last week . However, pet bars are still buggy and freeze for some players. Also, where’s the damn glow for high end weapon enchants hotfix?
item.content:encoded: There were only a few last week . However, pet bars are still buggy and freeze for some players. Also, where’s the damn glow for high end weapon enchants hotfix?

item.title: Forum Maintenance
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Fresh off the WoW forums. On Wednesday, March 14 at 11:59 PM PDT, we will be taking the forums down for extended maintenance which should conclude at approximately 10:00 AM PDT, Thursday morning. During this times the World of Warcraft … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Fresh off the WoW forums.

On Wednesday, March 14 at 11:59 PM PDT, we will be taking the forums down for extended maintenance which should conclude at approximately 10:00 AM PDT, Thursday morning. During this times the World of Warcraft forums will be unavailable. Account Management should be unaffected, however. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience that this may cause.

item.title: New Schedule For Tuesday Downtime
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Starting tomorrow, Blizzard will be using a new schedule for Tuesday downtime. Let’s hope this turns out better than their idea of “class balance”.
item.content:encoded: Starting tomorrow, Blizzard will be using a new schedule for Tuesday downtime. Let’s hope this turns out better than their idea of “class balance”.

item.title: LFG Channel To Make A Comeback
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Hooray. LFG Channel will be returning. This time, only be usable when you are using the LFG (looking for group) tool.
item.content:encoded: Hooray. LFG Channel will be returning. This time, only be usable when you are using the LFG (looking for group) tool.

item.title: No Gems For You!
item.dc:creator: Raster
item.description: Wondering where your monthly gem allotment from the Consortium is? In a void apparently, as yet another broken quest. Fear not, Blizzard will allegedly fix it in the next major patch, as they are in no rush to give people … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Wondering where your monthly gem allotment from the Consortium is? In a void apparently, as yet another broken quest. Fear not, Blizzard will allegedly fix it in the next major patch, as they are in no rush to give people something for free.
